techmeme.title: Deutsche Telekom and Perplexity announce they are working on an "AI Phone" priced at under $1K, first aimed at the European market and slated to launch in 2026 (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
BYD unveils "Lingyuan", a vehicle-mounted drone launching system available for all of its vehicles that costs about $2,200, developed in collaboration with DJI (Wes Davis/The Verge)
Anthropic raised a $3.5B Series E at a $61.5B post-money valuation led by Lightspeed Venture Partners; it has now raised $18.2B in total funding, per Crunchbase (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Documents and sources: the Trump administration cut 170 staff at the National Science Foundation federal agency, threatening AI research and US competitiveness (Jackie Davalos/Bloomberg)
Tim Cook posts that "this week" there's "something in the AIR", likely referring to an M4 MacBook Air launch; a new iPad Air is expected around this Spring (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
